tit.e: Yawata-maki (steamed eel roll with a burdock root)
Yawata-maki (steamed eel roll with a burdock root)

sen.j: 八幡巻（やわたまき）は、料理の一つ。
sen.e: Yawata-maki is a name of food.
Yawata-maki is a name of food.
Yawata-maki is a name of food.

sen.j: 煮て下調理した牛蒡を芯に、マアナゴ、ウナギ、牛肉などで巻き、付け焼きや、煮てつくる料理。
sen.e: It is conger eel, eel, or beef wrapped around boiled burdock root and then grilled with sauce, or cooked.
It is conger eel, eel, or beef wrapped around boiled burdock root and then grilled with sauce, or cooked.
It is conger eel, eel, or beef wrapped around boiled burdock root and then grilled with sauce, or cooked.

sen.j: 牛蒡の産地だった、京都の八幡市にちなむ。
sen.e: It was named after Yawata City, Kyoto, which is a burdock growing district.
It was named after Yawata City, Kyoto, which was a burdock growing district.
It was named after Yawata City, Kyoto, which was a burdock growing district.
